name: The Brand New DTCG for your PC & MAC
blurb: Digital Trading Card Game set in the world of supernatural horror. Fight for your soul, research, craft and unite together to survive.

rewards.reward: Digital copy of the game on release at a low price for your early support. Downloadable DTCG directly from us. A Personalized Special Thanks and name on Facebook Wall. And the Digital Instruction Book pdf.

TRAINEE SHAMAN TIER «»
All of the above plus:

2 Digital Starter Decks (your choice) (20.00 value). 10 Booster Packs (20.00 value). Kickstarter Exclusive ABDUCT DTCG beta invite.

SHAMAN TIER «»
All of the above plus:

3 Digital Starter Decks (your choice) (30.00 value). 25 Booster Packs (50.00 value).  Medicine Man’s Gambit. 
Kickstarter Exclusive Digital Poster Rift Cutter. White Path. 
Kickstarter Exclusive Digital Deck: Warrior. ABDUCT DTCG beta invite.

MASTER SHAMAN TIER «»
All of the above plus:

Digital copy of the game and 5 digital high-res posters of the artwork, plus exclusive access to frequent downloadable videos of commentated game footage showing new features as they are developed.

WARRIOR TIER 1 «»
All of the above plus: 

4 Digital Starter Decks (40.00 value). 40 Booster Packs (80.00 value). Kickstarter Exclusive. Digital Art Book “The Art of ABDUCT” PDF format.

WARRIOR TIER  2 «»
All of the above plus: 

Exclusive access to frequent downloadable videos of commentated game footage showing new features as they are developed.

KNIGHT TIER «»
All of the above plus:

The official his and hers ABDUCT T-Shirts. Plus soundtrack of the film and game.

CHAMPION TIER «»
All of the above plus: 

Collector's edition + physical boxed copy of the DTCG game on release + customized Mouse Mat. The box includes the installation Disc, a physical instruction book and the Poster.

PRO PLAYER TIER 1 «»
All of the above plus: 

Use a dedicated tool to design the appearance, traits and outfits of a character that will appear in the game. You can suggest a name and background but we reserve the right to adjust them.

PRO PLAYER TIER 2 «»
All of the above plus: 

Design the appearance and provide a short description of a weapon that will be appear in game. We will create something based on your guidelines and provide you with inside information on where it may be found!

PRO PLAYER TIER 3 «»
All of the above plus: 

Use a standalone editor to design your own arena section of terrain that will be integrated and featured in the game. You will also be able to place some structures. Subject to our relaxed guidelines and review.

PRO PLAYER EXCLUSIVE «»
All of the above plus: 

Get the exclusive special edition table to game with all the cards and 6 beautifully crafted miniatures with signed box by all the developers.

PRO DEVELOPER TIER «»
All of the above plus: 

Have a one hour Skype call with the developers during which you can discuss any aspect of the game.

PRO DESIGNER TIER «»
All of the above plus: 

Spend a day with the members of the development team doing whatever you want (within reason). You can even try your hand at designing something for the game using our full blown tool set. You can bring one other person with you. Must be able to travel to London, England.

CELEBRITY TIER 2 «»
All of the above plus: 

Come to the US ABDUCT MOVIE PREMIER and US DTCG official launch event. Play for the ABDUCT TROPHY presented by MHAIRI CALVEY and JACK O’HALLORAN.

CELEBRITY TIER 1 «»
All of the above plus: 

Come to the UK ABDUCT MOVIE PREMIER and UK DTCG official launch event. ABDUCT TROPHY presented by MHAIRI CALVEY. Must be able to travel to London, England.
